ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That Day We will display Hell in its totality to the kafirun,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then We shall bring Hell right before the infidels
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That will be the Day We shall place Hell before the unbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We will fully expose the view of hell on that Day to the disbelievers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We shall bring hell in front of the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And on that Day We shall present Hell to the disbelievers, plain to view.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We will bring forth hell, exposed to view, on that day before the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and upon that day We shall present Gehenna to the unbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On that day we shall present hell to the disbelievers, plain to view,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day We shall lay Hell bare before those who deny the truth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We shall set hell on that Day unto the infidels with a setting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and on that day We shall bring hell into view visibly for the faithless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We shall present Hell that day for Unbelievers to see, all spread out,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And on that Day We shall present Hell to the disbelievers, plain to view,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day We shall present Gehenna (Hell) to the unbelievers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day, We will present the disbelievers to Hell, all displayed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We will present Hell that Day to the Disbelievers, on display -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:100] And on that day We shall present, We shall bring close, Hell to the disbelievers, plain to view,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On that day) the Day of Judgement (We shall present hell) We shall reveal hell (to the disbelievers) before they enter it, (plain to view) clear for them to see,
